statements.sql: select `A`.*, `B`.`slug`, `B`.`title`, `B`.`meta_seo` from `seos` as `A` left join `seo_languages` as `B` on `A`.`id` = `B`.`seo_id` where FIND_IN_SET('publish',A.status) and `A`.`link` = 'http://localhost/laravel/begreen' and `B`.`language` = 'vi' order by `A`.`priority` asc, `A`.`id` desc limit 1

statements.sql: select `A`.`id`, `A`.`link`, `A`.`image`, `A`.`alt`, `B`.`title`, `B`.`slug`, `B`.`description` from `posts` as `A` left join `post_languages` as `B` on `A`.`id` = `B`.`post_id` where `B`.`language` = 'vi' and FIND_IN_SET('publish',A.status) and `A`.`type` = 'tieu-chi' order by `A`.`priority` asc, `A`.`id` desc limit 5

select `A`.`id`, `A`.`code`, `A`.`regular_price`, `A`.`sale_price`, `A`.`link`, `A`.`image`, `A`.`alt`, `A`.`category_id`, `A`.`user_id`, `A`.`type`, `B`.`title`, `B`.`slug` from `products` as `A` left join `product_languages` as `B` on `A`.`id` = `B`.`product_id` where `B`.`language` = 'vi' and FIND_IN_SET('publish',A.status) and FIND_IN_SET('new',A.status) and `A`.`type` = 'san-pham' order by `A`.`priority` asc, `A`.`id` desc limit 10

select `A`.`id`, `A`.`link`, `A`.`image`, `A`.`alt`, `B`.`title`, `B`.`description` from `posts` as `A` left join `post_languages` as `B` on `A`.`id` = `B`.`post_id` where `B`.`language` = 'vi' and FIND_IN_SET('publish',A.status) and FIND_IN_SET('index',A.status) and `A`.`type` = 'khach-hang' order by `A`.`priority` asc, `A`.`id` desc limit 5

select `A`.`id`, `A`.`link`, `A`.`image`, `A`.`alt`, `A`.`updated_at`, `B`.`title`, `B`.`slug`, `B`.`description` from `posts` as `A` left join `post_languages` as `B` on `A`.`id` = `B`.`post_id` where `B`.`language` = 'vi' and FIND_IN_SET('publish',A.status) and FIND_IN_SET('new',A.status) and `A`.`type` = 'tin-tuc' order by `A`.`priority` asc, `A`.`id` desc limit 3

select `A`.`id`, `A`.`parent`, `A`.`icon`, `B`.`title`, `B`.`slug` from `categories` as `A` left join `category_languages` as `B` on `A`.`id` = `B`.`category_id` where `B`.`language` = 'vi' and FIND_IN_SET('publish',A.status) and `A`.`priority` > '0' and `A`.`type` = 'san-pham' order by `A`.`priority` asc, `A`.`id` desc

select `A`.`id`, `A`.`parent`, `A`.`icon`, `B`.`title`, `B`.`slug` from `categories` as `A` left join `category_languages` as `B` on `A`.`id` = `B`.`category_id` where `B`.`language` = 'vi' and FIND_IN_SET('publish',A.status) and `A`.`priority` > '0' and `A`.`type` = 'dich-vu' order by `A`.`priority` asc, `A`.`id` desc

select `A`.`id`, `A`.`parent`, `A`.`icon`, `B`.`title`, `B`.`slug` from `categories` as `A` left join `category_languages` as `B` on `A`.`id` = `B`.`category_id` where `B`.`language` = 'vi' and FIND_IN_SET('publish',A.status) and `A`.`priority` > '0' and `A`.`type` = 'thu-thuat' order by `A`.`priority` asc, `A`.`id` desc
